title: Ripple (XRP) and Cardano (ADA) Teeter on the Brink of a Major Rally Again – What's Different Now?
description: Delve into the intriguing prospects of Ripple (XRP) and Cardano (ADA) as they approach a potential major rally, sparking curiosity about what makes this time different. Our in-depth analysis examines their latest market maneuvers and technological advancements, shedding light on the unique factors that could drive their next big surge. Get ahead in the cryptocurrency realm with our expert insights, designed to navigate you through the nuances of this dynamic and unpredictable financial terrain.

title: ‘Cantillon Effect’ Can Be Countered by Having ‘Bitcoin Only’ Companies Present at the Negotiating Table — Swan Bitcoin MD
description: The crypto industry can stop the so-called Cantillon Effect from occurring by establishing large enough “Bitcoin only” companies that will sit on the negotiating table with the U.S. Federal Reserve and major financial institutions, Swan Bitcoin’s Terrance Yang has said. According to Yang, the U.S. Department of Justice’s settlement with Binance has increased the likelihood […]

title: Cosmos proposal 848 leads to the creation of a new AtomOne network
description: In a landmark decision that has sent ripples through the cryptocurrency community, Jae Kwon, the co-founder of Cosmos, has announced the creation of a new network, AtomOne ( ATOM1). This development comes in the wake of the controversial approval of Proposal 848 by the Cosmos community. The proposal, which set the maximum inflation of the ... Read more

title: Binance to delist these coins on Dec 7th – What can you shift trade to?
description: Binance, the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, has stated that BitShares (BTS), PERL.eco (PERL), Tornado Cash (TORN), and Waltonchain (WTC) will be removed from its platform.  The following trading pairs will be deleted when the amendment goes into effect on December 7: BTS/USDT, PERL/USDT, TORN/BUSD, WTC/BTC, and WTC/USDT. Binance’s ‘market cleansing’ portfolio for ... Read more

title: Ethereum Price Surges Past $2,000 Amidst BlackRock’s Interest in ETH ETF
description: Ethereum price struggles to sustain above $2,080 and encounters challenges below the 23.6 percent Fibonacci retracement level, signaling potential pressure on its price. Ethereum’s co-founder, Vitalik Buterin, discussed the platform’s future roadmap and emphasized the need to redesign Ethereum staking for increased decentralization. Ether, the native cryptocurrency of the Ethereum blockchain network has been showing [...]

title: CJournal Raised US$1 million from Angle Capital and Yearn Consulting Group
description: CJournal, a Read to Earn project leading the independent journalism revolution, recently received US$1 million in financing from Angle Capital and Yearn Consulting Group.  CJournal aims to create transparent and credible on-channels and reviews for the crypto industry. In return for reading and reviewing articles, users earn rewards. With the ambition of building a decentralized [...]

title: Former Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao Faces Potential 10-Year Sentence
description:
A recent filing in the legal case against the former CEO of Binance, Changpeng Zhao, revealed that Zhao could face a substantial prison sentence of up to 10 years. On November 24, the prosecutors claimed that Zhao voluntarily appeared in the U.S. to face justice. The court stated that Zhao was allowed to remain free […]
